reviewText: first of all, let me start off by saying that I, just like any Yu-Gi-Oh! fan, am extremelly upset that they never released the first part of the Season 3 (the Virtual World episodes with Noah). So, to summarize 24-episode saga - this is what happened: After Marik and Bakura duel in Yu Gi Oh - Battle City Duels - Showdown in the Shadows, Kaiba heads off to Alcatraz for the second part of the Battle City finals. However, on their way there, the gang gets trapped in a Virtual World were they must face Kaiba's stepbrother Noah and the Big Five from the "LEGENDARY HEROES" 3 episode adventure from Season 1 (you know, when Kaiba's workers trapped him inside a video game...) Everyone (even Tea, Tristan, and Duke) had to duel in the Virtual World in order to escape, and when everyone defeats the Big Five and Yugi defeats Noah and Kaiba defeats the real villain behind it all (which I'm not going to say who it is in case you want to watch it online or something), the Battle City finals begin! (By the way, there is a small flashback of the Noah episodes in the DVD Yu-Gi-Oh!: Season 3, Vol. 5 - The Final Face-Off). So, here are the episodes included in this DVD: 122. Back to Battle City: Part I 123. Back to Battle City: Part II 124. Back to Battle City: Part III 125. The Darkness Returns: Part I What you'll see on this DVD is basically that the quarter-finals are over and the semi-finals have begun. Kaiba organizes a four-way duel where it is Yugi vs. Kaiba vs. Marik vs. Joey! No teams! No double duels! Everyone is everyone's opponent! The first two duelists to loose won't be disqualiifed...they'll just be the first to face each other off in the first duel of real semi-finals. The two duelists to win this four-way duel will duel each other in the second duel of the semi-finals. THE DARKNESS RETURNS: PART I is already the first official duel of the semi-finals. Who will it be? Yugi and Kaiba? Yugi and Joey? Yugi and Marik? Kaiba and Joey? Kaiba and Marik? or Marik and Joey? This is a must-watch for any Yu-Gi-Oh! fan! Please check out my review of the other four Enter the Shadow Realm DVDs: Yu-Gi-Oh!: Season 3, Vol. 1 - Back to Battle City Yu Gi Oh Series 3, Vol. 2 - Darkness Returns Yu Gi Oh Series 3, Vol. 3 - Clash in the Coliseum Yu Gi Oh - Battle for the Bronze (Season 3, Volume 4) Yu-Gi-Oh!: Season 3, Vol. 5 - The Final Face-Off

Obviously this is a must see for anyone following the YuGiOh! series as this is the begining of the final finals leading up to the big finish where Yugi gets all the Egyptian God cards.

The four way duel is entertaining and it's nice to see Joey stand up for himself and try to be his own man...or duelist.

The correct Episode titles are:
1.  Back to Battle City - Part 1
2.  Back to Battle City - Part 2
3.  Back to Battle City - Part 3
4.  Return of the Darkness - Part 1
I just wish that Funimation will not restrict viewers from skipping the lengthy commercials before you can actually get to the Main Menu.  It's a great DVD.

these episodes are good and everything, but i was just wonderin why they aren't releasing the virtual world season???? it did air before these episodes. does neone kno the answer??????? .....well neway, these episodes focus on the final four people in the battle city finals, yugi, joey, marik, and kaiba. they have a 4-way duel to determine who faces who. im not sure how many episodes will be on this dvd, but i still don't understand what happended with the virtual world???
